message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and would like to propose a price of $95.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with a price of $100.
I understand that you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $102.
